title: Displaying Data
description: Display the first 5 rows of data from the covid19.csv spreadsheet. Don't include the column titles in your row count.
answer: Jurisdiction,Week of Allocations,1st Dose Allocations,2nd Dose Allocations
hint: The ToText action is called on the data frame after the data is loaded. Change the parameter value from 0 to 5 to tell the action how many rows to display.
